title: Only You in Oak Glen
description: Their secret found them.Being the most popular therapist in True Springs for the last twenty years has given Dr. Blake Ryan insight into just about everyone's mind. She's the calmest, most capable woman in town. Why can't she could manage her own life as efficiently as she manages everyone else's?Fire Chief Gus Wilkerson was the star quarterback of the True Springs High School football team. But that was a lifetime ago. Now, he's divorced the Prom Queen, estranged from his children, and being replaced in his job. He was supposed to be the town's hero, but now he's just another old guy sitting on his brains in the town bar.They may live in the same town, but Blake and Gus barely acknowledge each other. The only thing they have in common is a secret.A secret who now wants to get to know her birth parents.Ticket to True Love is a new series about fresh beginnings, second chances, and finding true love in unexpected places. Visitors to True Springs are skeptical about the town's legendary water leading them to love, but residents believe. Even they don't realize, however, that the water is only part of the story...
author: Julie Strauss
